products.title: chamomile toner
products.description: A gentle, soothing toner enriched with chamomile extract to calm and refresh sensitive skin. Helps balance the skin’s pH, reduce redness, and prepare your skin for better absorption of serums and moisturizers

products.title: Alpha_Arbutin serum
products.description: A potent brightening serum formulated with Alpha Arbutin to reduce dark spots, even skin tone, and restore radiance. Lightweight and fast-absorbing, it helps fade hyperpigmentation and leaves your skin smooth and luminous.

products.title: collagen_Boost serum
products.description: A revitalizing serum designed to boost collagen production, improve skin elasticity, and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Leaves the skin firm, smooth, and radiant

products.title: vitamin c serum
products.description: A brightening and antioxidant-rich serum infused with Vitamin C to protect the skin from free radicals, even out skin tone, and enhance radiance. Helps reduce dark spots and gives the skin a healthy, glowing appearance

products.description: A brightening and antioxidant-rich serum infused with Vitamin C to protect the skin from free radicals, even out skin tone, and enhance radiance. Helps reduce dark spots and gives the skin a healthy, glowing appearance

products.title: vitamin E toner
products.description: A nourishing toner enriched with Vitamin E to hydrate, soothe, and protect the skin from environmental stress. Helps restore softness, improve skin texture, and prepare the skin for better absorption of moisturizers and serums.

products.title: camella sead_oil
products.description: A lightweight and nourishing oil extracted from camellia seeds, rich in antioxidants and essential fatty acids. Helps hydrate, soften, and protect the skin while improving elasticity and promoting a healthy, radiant glow.

products.title: evening_primrose oil
products.description: A nourishing oil rich in essential fatty acids and antioxidants, designed to soothe, hydrate, and restore the skin’s natural barrier. Helps improve elasticity, reduce inflammation, and leave the skin soft, smooth, and radiant.

products.title: green tea mask
products.description: A soothing and antioxidant-rich mask formulated with green tea extract to calm irritated skin, fight free radicals, and revitalize your complexion. Leaves the skin refreshed, smooth, and radiant.

products.title: jojoba oil
products.description: A lightweight, natural oil that closely mimics the skin’s own sebum. Deeply hydrates, balances oil production, soothes irritation, and promotes smooth, soft, and healthy-looking skin.

products.title: marula oil
products.description: A luxurious, antioxidant-rich oil that deeply nourishes and hydrates the skin. Helps improve elasticity, protect against environmental stress, and leaves the skin soft, radiant, and rejuvenated.

products.title: honey & almon bodylotion
products.description: rich and nourishing body lotion infused with honey and almond oil to deeply hydrate, soften, and soothe the skin. Leaves the skin smooth, radiant, and delicately fragranced.

products.title: clay_detox mask
products.description: A purifying clay mask designed to draw out impurities, excess oil, and toxins from the skin. Helps minimize pores, detoxify, and leave the skin refreshed, smooth, and radiant.

products.title: squalene oil
products.description: A lightweight, non-greasy oil that deeply hydrates and locks in moisture. Helps restore skin’s natural barrier, improve elasticity, and leave the skin soft, smooth, and radiant

products.title: Anti-Aging bodylotion
